title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
December 3, 2020
On Thursday, December 3, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 5901, the “Information Technology Modernization Centers of Excellence Program Act,” which requires the General Services Administration to establish an Information Technology Modernization Centers of Excellence Program to facilitate the adoption of modern technology by executive agencies on a reimbursable basis.
